about_the_game:
Tentacle Tango is a quirky co-op puzzle-platformer where you and a partner must work together, tethered by a flexible tentacle. Don’t let the cute visuals fool you—this game is as challenging as it is charming. Every jump, swing, and tentacle bend requires precise coordination as you navigate puzzles, obstacles, and enemies. Whether playing solo or in local co-op, teamwork is your only path to victory, because after all, it takes two to tango!

Unique Co-op Gameplay

Bound together, you and your partner must synchronize your movements to overcome every challenge. Use momentum, timing, and teamwork to swing across gaps, avoid traps, and defeat enemies. In Tentacle Tango, even the smallest misstep can send you both tumbling, adding to the game's deceptively tough nature.

Diverse Worlds to Explore

Each world brings new, progressively challenging obstacles—from crumbling platforms to intricate puzzles that require perfect coordination. The difficulty ramps up with every level, demanding quick reflexes and flawless teamwork.

Solo or Local Co-op

Play solo, controlling both characters, or team up with a friend in local co-op mode. Whether you're flying solo or partnering up, success hinges on perfect synchronization and timing.

Leaderboards and Achievements

Climb the leaderboards by setting the best times, and compete with friends or globally to prove you’re the ultimate tandem team. Achievements await those who master the tango of teamwork.

Cute, Yet Challenging

Don’t be deceived by the adorable art style and quirky character designs. Tentacle Tango may look like a lighthearted adventure, but underneath is a tough, skill-based challenge that tests your patience and precision. Success requires sharp timing and flawless coordination.

Ready to test your teamwork? Tentacle Tango will put your cooperative skills to the test—because it truly takes two to tango!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RDNA 2

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Tentacle Tango

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Tentacle Tango is a co-op puzzle-platformer where you and a partner are bound by a tentacle! Work together to jump, swing, and navigate tricky levels filled with puzzles and obstacles. Play solo or with a friend—perfect teamwork is the key to reaching the finish!
